title: Conditional Generators of Words Definitions
authors:
Gadetsky, Artyom  and
Yakubovskiy, Ilya  and
Vetrov, Dmitry
venue: Proceedings of the 56th Annual Meeting of the Association for Computational Linguistics (Volume 2: Short Papers)
abstract: We explore recently introduced definition modeling technique that provided the tool for evaluation of different distributed vector representations of words through modeling dictionary definitions of words. In this work, we study the problem of word ambiguities in definition modeling and propose a possible solution by employing latent variable modeling and soft attention mechanisms. Our quantitative and qualitative evaluation and analysis of the model shows that taking into account wordsâ€™ ambiguity and polysemy leads to performance improvement.
